android.car.hardware.property

类 EvStoppingMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.hardware.property.EvStoppingMode

  • public final class EvStoppingMode
extends java.lang.Object
    Used by VehiclePropertyIds.EV_STOPPING_MODE to enumerate the current state of the stopping mode.

    This list of states may be extended to include more states in the future.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  EvStoppingMode.EvStoppingModeInt 

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int STATE_CREEP
      Vehicle slowly moves forward when the brake pedal is released.
      static int STATE_HOLD
      Vehicle stops and holds its position when the brake pedal is released.
      static int STATE_OTHER
      Other EV stopping mode.
      static int STATE_ROLL
      Vehicle rolls freely when the brake pedal is released (similar to neutral gear).

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String toString(int evStoppingMode)
      Returns a user-friendly representation of an EV stopping mode.

    • 字段详细资料

      • STATE_OTHER

        public static final int STATE_OTHER
        Other EV stopping mode. Ideally, this should never be used.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_CREEP

        public static final int STATE_CREEP
        Vehicle slowly moves forward when the brake pedal is released.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_ROLL

        public static final int STATE_ROLL
        Vehicle rolls freely when the brake pedal is released (similar to neutral gear).
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值

      • STATE_HOLD

        public static final int STATE_HOLD
        Vehicle stops and holds its position when the brake pedal is released.
        另请参阅:
        常量字段值
